lustre/tests/mmap_cat.c

00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 #include <unistd.h>
00036 #include <errno.h>
00037 #include <sys/mman.h>
00038 #include <sys/types.h>
00039 #include <fcntl.h>
00040 #include <sys/stat.h>
00041 #include <assert.h>
00042 
00043 int save_errno;
00044 
00045 char usage[] =
00046 "Usage: %s <file>\n"
00047 "       mmap <file> and cat its content\n";
00048 
00049 size_t getFilesize(const char *filename)
00050 {
00051         struct stat st;
00052 
00053         if (stat(filename, &st) == -1) {
00054                 save_errno = errno;
00055                 perror("stat");
00056                 exit(save_errno);
00057         }
00058         return st.st_size;
00059 }
00060 
00061 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00062 {
00063         size_t filesize;
00064         int fd;
00065         void *mmappedData;
00066         int rc;
00067 
00068         if (argc != 2) {
00069                 fprintf(stderr, usage, argv[0]);
00070                 exit(1);
00071         }
00072 
00073         filesize = getFilesize(argv[1]);
00074 
00075         /* Open file */
00076         fd = open(argv[1], O_RDONLY, 0);
00077         if (fd == -1) {
00078                 save_errno = errno;
00079                 perror("open");
00080                 exit(save_errno);
00081         }
00082 
00083         /* Execute mmap */
00084         mmappedData = mmap(NULL, filesize, PROT_READ,
00085                            MAP_PRIVATE | MAP_POPULATE, fd, 0);
00086         if (mmappedData == MAP_FAILED) {
00087                 save_errno = errno;
00088                 perror("mmap");
00089                 exit(save_errno);
00090         }
00091 
00092         /* Write the mmapped data to stdout (= FD #1) */
00093         rc = write(1, mmappedData, filesize);
00094         if (rc == -1) {
00095                 save_errno = errno;
00096                 perror("write");
00097                 exit(save_errno);
00098         }
00099 
00100         rc = munmap(mmappedData, filesize);
00101         if (rc == -1) {
00102                 save_errno = errno;
00103                 perror("munmap");
00104                 exit(save_errno);
00105         }
00106 
00107         rc = close(fd);
00108         if (rc == -1) {
00109                 save_errno = errno;
00110                 perror("close");
00111                 exit(save_errno);
00112         }
00113 
00114         return 0;
00115 }
